column1: George wants to warm his hands quickly by rubbing them. Which skin surface will produce the most heat? \n (A) dry palms (B) wet palms (C) palms covered with oil (D) palms covered with lotion

Which of the following statements best explains why magnets usually stick to a refrigerator door? \n (A) The refrigerator door is smooth. (B) The refrigerator door contains iron. (C) The refrigerator door is a good conductor. (D) The refrigerator door has electric wires in it.

A fold observed in layers of sedimentary rock most likely resulted from the \n (A) cooling of flowing magma. (B) converging of crustal plates. (C) deposition of river sediments. (D) solution of carbonate minerals.
